title: Looking to Move TODAY? Apply, get Approved and Move In!
posting_body: Use this link for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 708 Sq.
We are now offering BOTH virtual tours and in person tours by appointment only!
Call or email today to schedule!
With this superbly walkable location (Walkscore of 98!)
it's easy to immerse yourself in the community.
Located in the heart of the Alaska Junction, we are just steps away from delicious food and drinks, daily errands, and fun shopping!
We are just a short 20 minute drive from Boeing Seattle, and 30 minutes to Boeing Renton!
Our Boutique community boasts custom design features like two tone cabinets, gorgeous wooden barn doors, and floor to ceiling windows.
You will fall in love with your new home at 4730 California!
Host your next function in The Junction Lounge, or just hangout on our rooftop deck at the Level 8 Lounge!
It's the perfect hangout spot in the Summer time!
With amazing views of the Sound, Mt. Rainier, and the surrounding mountain ranges, you'll want to stay up there all day!
- Large Wooden Barn Doors in Bedrooms
*please call for requirements for MFTE homes
